post:
Hi Everyone,

Evorack is pleased to announce that as of today, we are able to offer NetBSD 5.1 on all of our VPS plans. While most providers out there only offer Linux, we feel that there is a small but significant market out there for NetBSD VPSes.

Also remember that our £3.50 off coupon code "LEB2011Autumn" (which makes plans start from as low as £2.49 per month) is still available: http://www.lowendbox.com/blog/evorack-2-49-128mb-xen-vps-in-uk-2/

If anyone has any questions, please feel free to post here or open a ticket at http://www.Evorack.com

Thanks,

Jonny
